author: rivenbark
title: Cardano Challenges
description: How can Catalyst solve specific problems the broader Cardano Community faces while giving more people opportunity to participate?
importance: This approach allows Catalyst funds to be directed a specific, voted upon solution (like an X Prize) which is more accessible to everyone.
success: Addition, solution-specific Challenges with requirements and bounty to award any person/team who creates a specific solution to help Cardano
